name: DIECE (ERNOSTEF)
description:
The page is still blank due to technical issues.

Cuphead inspired game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. In this game you have to survive bunch of randomly generated boss fights with only a baseball bat.

Here's some stuff i forgot to tell in the game: Your hp is displayed in the background in case you didn't notice, when the boss spawns there is a black circle that damages you, USE THE DASH!
